# JustTalk AI

> JustTalk AI is an English speaking practice platform that uses AI to provide realistic conversations with memory, tracking progress over time to build speaking confidence through cumulative improvement.

JustTalk AI helps intermediate and advanced English learners improve their speaking skills through:
- AI conversations that remember previous sessions and build on them
- Real-time speaking practice without grammar drills or scripted exercises
- Progress tracking and analytics to measure improvement
- Multiple AI personalities with different teaching styles
- Role-play scenarios for practical speaking situations
- Optional integration with live tutors for advanced learning

## Key Features

- [Platform Overview](https://justtalk.ai/): Main landing page explaining the JustTalk AI approach to speaking practice
- [Tutoring Platform](https://justtalk.ai/platform): Information about the live tutor marketplace
- [Become a Teacher](https://justtalk.ai/becometeacher): Information for educators interested in joining as tutors
- [Terms of Service](https://justtalk.ai/terms): Legal terms and conditions

## Product Information

- Target Audience: Intermediate to advanced English learners who want to improve through speaking
- Not For: Complete beginners or those looking for grammar lessons and passive study
- Core Value: Conversations are tracked and used to build each session on the last, making progress cumulative
- AI Features: Memory across sessions, adaptive conversations, real-time corrections, progress analytics
- Pricing: Subscription-based with free trial available
- Platform Access: Web-based at chat.justtalk.ai
